Package ohos.telephony

Class PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.telephony.PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Text.TextObserver

    public class PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver
extends Object
implements Text.TextObserver
    Provides an observer to listen for phone number changes in the text component.

    If a new character is detected, the phone number will be formatted based on the country/region code.

    Since:
    4

    • Constructor Summary

      PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver​(String countryCode)
      A constructor used to create a PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver instance for observing phone number changes of the text component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver

        public PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver​(String countryCode)
        A constructor used to create a PhoneNumberFormattingTextObserver instance for observing phone number changes of the text component.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - Indicates a two-digit country/region code defined in ISO 3166-1.
        Since:
        4

    • Method Detail

      • onTextUpdated

        public void onTextUpdated​(String phoneNumber,
                          int start,
                          int before,
                          int count)
        Description copied from interface: Text.TextObserver
        Called back when the text is changed.

        This method is used to process the changed text, for example, to verify the input LOV to get LOVE, for which text is LOVE, start is 3, before is 3, and count is 1.

        Specified by:
        onTextUpdated in interface Text.TextObserver
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Indicates the current text.
        start - Indicates the start position of the text to be added.
        before - Indicates the length of the old text.
        count - Indicates the length of the text to be added.

      • getPhoneNumberAfterFormat

        public String getPhoneNumberAfterFormat​()
        Obtains the phone number after being formatted.
        Returns:
        Returns the formatted phone number.
        Since:
        4
